BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.summary: NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGattCharacteristic interface of the Web Bluetooth API represents a GATT Characteristic, which is a basic data element that provides further information about a peripheral's service.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicWriteVa.summary: NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValueWithResponse() method sets a object's value property to the bytes contained in a given , , or , writes the characteristic value with required response, and returns the resulting .

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicStopNot.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.stopNotifications() method
returns a to the BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instance when
there is no longer an active notification on it.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicValue.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.value read-only
property returns currently cached characteristic value. This value gets updated when the
value of the characteristic is read or updated via a notification or indication.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicWriteVa.summary: NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValueWithoutResponse() method sets a object's value property to the bytes contained in a given , , or , writes the characteristic value without response, and returns the resulting .

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicService.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.service read-only
property returns the this characteristic belongs to.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicReadVal.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.readValue() method
returns a that resolves to a holding a
duplicate of the value property if it is available and supported. Otherwise
it throws an error.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicGetDesc.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptor() method
returns a that resolves to the
first for a given descriptor UUID.
BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicGetDesc.returns:
A that resolves to the
first .

remarks.para: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValue() method sets a object's value property to the bytes contained in a given , , or , writes the characteristic value with optional response, and returns the resulting .

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicPropert.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.properties
read-only property returns a instance
containing the properties of this characteristic.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicGetDesc.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptors() method
returns a that resolves to an of all
objects for a given descriptor UUID.
BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicGetDesc.returns:
A that resolves to an
of objects.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicUuid.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.uuid read-only
property returns a string containing the UUID of the characteristic, for
example '00002a37-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb' for the Heart Rate
Measurement characteristic.

BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristicStartNo.summary:
NOTE Experimental The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.startNotifications() method
returns a to the BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic instance when
there is an active notification on it.
